title: Is One of the ‘Slenderman’ Stabbing Teens Petitioning for Release?
subtitle: A court hearing on the girl's request was set for June 2021.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Anissa Weier, one of the teens sentenced to live in a mental health facility after the 2014 "Slender Man" stabbing, has petitioned a court for her release.
